page.title: 15TRANSPORT IN BISHOPS FROME
page.content: The following public transport, supplied by private bus companies, is available: Bishops Frome to Hereford: Three buses each way daily (except Sunday) travelling along B4214 and A4103. On Wednesday (Hereford's market day) there is an extra bus each way travelling via Burley Gate. Fromes Hill to Hereford: On Saturday there is one bus each way travelling along A4103. Bishops Frome to Bromyard: On Thursday (formerly Bromyard's market day) There is one bus each way, travelling on B4214. Bishops From to Worcester: On Saturday there is one bus each way, travelling via Acton Cross. There is also a taxi service operated by the Garage.
